name: Amelie
description: Amelie has shoulder-length, wavy dark brown hair. She wears round, thin-rimmed glasses. Her outfit consists of a white button-down shirt, which is both classic and professional. The shirt has the sleeves rolled up slightly, adding a touch of casual ease to her attire. Amelie's expression is composed and confident, with a subtle, poised smile. She has a pair of small gold hoop earrings that add a hint of elegance to her appearance. The solid blue background enhances her features and attire, creating a professional and polished impression.

name: Ann

Ann's expression is warm and composed, with a slight, friendly smile that conveys approachability and confidence. The solid blue background highlights her features and attire, creating a polished and professional impression.

name: Carl
description: Carl has dark brown, slightly wavy hair that is of short to medium length and neatly combed to the side. He sports a full beard and mustache, both of which are well-groomed, adding to his distinguished appearance. He wears round, thin-rimmed glasses that complement his intellectual look. Dressed in a stylish blue suit jacket with a subtle sheen, he pairs it with a crisp white dress shirt, which is buttoned up but without a tie, giving a modern and professional vibe. His pose, with arms confidently crossed over his chest, enhances his authoritative presence. The solid blue background further emphasizes the professional and polished nature of the portrait, making him stand out prominently.

name: Diana
description: Diana has long, straight, jet-black hair that cascades down her shoulders. She is wearing rectangular, thick-rimmed glasses that frame her face and contribute to her sophisticated look. Her attire consists of a light gray blazer with a subtle herringbone pattern, which she pairs with a light pink blouse, adding a touch of color and softness to her professional outfit. She has a warm and friendly smile, which, along with her slightly tilted pose, conveys approachability and confidence. The solid blue background enhances the focus on her, creating a polished and professional impression.
